WDY_COMPONENTT.DESCRIPTION: WebDynpro to auto-generate a new password for Fiori user

WDY_CTLR_COMPO.CODE_BODY:
METHOD get_email_parameters .
DATA: ls_usr21 TYPE usr21, ls_adr6 TYPE adr6, lv_full_name TYPE adrp-name_text.
SELECT SINGLE * FROM usr21 INTO ls_usr21 WHERE bname EQ im_username. IF sy-subrc EQ 0. SELECT * FROM adr6 INTO ls_adr6 WHERE addrnumber EQ ls_usr21-addrnumber AND persnumber EQ ls_usr21-persnumber AND date_from LE sy-datum ORDER BY date_from DESCENDING. EXIT. ENDSELECT. IF sy-subrc EQ 0. MOVE ls_adr6-smtp_addr TO ex_email_address. SELECT SINGLE name_text FROM adrp INTO ex_fullname WHERE persnumber EQ ls_usr21-persnumber. ENDIF. ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD reset_password .
DATA: lv_username TYPE bapibname-bapibname, lv_random TYPE c LENGTH 8, lv_password TYPE bapipwd, lt_return TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF bapiret2, ls_return TYPE bapiret2.
lv_username = im_username.
* Generate a random password of length 8 CALL FUNCTION 'RSEC_GENERATE_PASSWORD' EXPORTING alphabet_length = 8 output_length = 8 IMPORTING output = lv_random EXCEPTIONS some_error = 1 OTHERS = 2.
IF sy-subrc NE 0. ex_subrc = 1. "Error generating a random password. MESSAGE e015(zbc_reset_password) INTO ex_message. * Error generating a random password.
EXIT. ENDIF.
ex_password = lv_random. lv_password = lv_random.
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_USER_CHANGE' EXPORTING username = lv_username password = lv_password passwordx = 'X' TABLES return = lt_return.
READ TABLE lt_return INTO ls_return INDEX 1. IF ls_return-type NE 'S'. ex_subrc = 2. ex_message = ls_return-message. CLEAR ex_password. ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD send_email_to_user .
DATA: lv_send_result TYPE c,
lo_sender TYPE REF TO if_sender_bcs, lo_receiver TYPE REF TO if_recipient_bcs,
lo_email TYPE REF TO cl_bcs, lo_email_body TYPE REF TO cl_document_bcs,
lx_exception TYPE REF TO cx_bcs.
TRY. lo_email = cl_bcs=>create_persistent( ).
lo_email_body = cl_document_bcs=>create_document( i_type = 'RAW' i_text = im_t_body i_subject = im_v_subject ).
lo_email->set_document( lo_email_body ).
lo_sender = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( im_v_sender ).
lo_receiver = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( im_v_receiver ). lo_email->add_recipient( i_recipient = lo_receiver i_express = 'X' ).
lo_email->set_sender( i_sender = lo_sender ).
lo_email->set_send_immediately( 'X' ).
lo_email->send( EXPORTING i_with_error_screen = 'X' RECEIVING result = lv_send_result ).
ex_send_result = lv_send_result.
COMMIT WORK.
CATCH cx_bcs INTO lx_exception.
ENDTRY.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD verify_auth_from_table .
DATA: ls_zbc_reset_pwd TYPE zbc_reset_pwd.
CLEAR ex_valid. SELECT * FROM zbc_reset_pwd INTO ls_zbc_reset_pwd WHERE authdate EQ im_authdate AND uname EQ im_uname AND uuid EQ im_uuid. ex_valid = abap_true. ENDSELECT.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD wddoinit .
DATA lo_nd_labels TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_labels TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_labels TYPE wd_this->element_labels.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <LABELS> via lead selection lo_nd_labels = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_labels ).
* get element via lead selection lo_el_labels = lo_nd_labels->get_element( ).
MESSAGE s014(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_labels-header_confirmation_view. * Password Reset Confirmation MESSAGE s023(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_labels-header_error_view. * Password Reset Failed
* set all declared attributes lo_el_labels->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_labels ).
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD handlefrom_main .
DATA: lt_body TYPE bcsy_text, ls_line LIKE LINE OF lt_body, ls_line2 LIKE LINE OF lt_body, lv_subject TYPE so_obj_des, lv_sender TYPE ad_smtpadr, lv_receiver TYPE ad_smtpadr, lv_send_result TYPE c.
DATA lo_componentcontroller TYPE REF TO ig_componentcontroller . lo_componentcontroller = wd_this->get_componentcontroller_ctr( ).
DATA lo_nd_email_message TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_email_message TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_email_message TYPE wd_this->element_email_message.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <EMAIL_MESSAGE> via lead selection lo_nd_email_message = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_email_message ).
* get element via lead selection lo_el_email_message = lo_nd_email_message->get_element( ).
* get all declared attributes lo_el_email_message->get_static_attributes( IMPORTING static_attributes = ls_email_message ).
* Send email message lv_sender = ls_email_message-sender. lv_receiver = ls_email_message-recipient. lv_subject = ls_email_message-subject.
CLEAR ls_line. ls_line = ls_email_message-line01. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. ls_line = ls_email_message-line02. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. ls_line = ls_email_message-line03. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. ls_line = ls_email_message-line04. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. ls_line = ls_email_message-line05. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
lo_componentcontroller->send_email_to_user( EXPORTING im_t_body = lt_body im_v_receiver = lv_receiver im_v_sender = lv_sender im_v_subject = lv_subject IMPORTING ex_send_result = lv_send_result ).
ENDMETHOD.

method WDDOBEFOREACTION . * data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller. * data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
* lo_api_controller = wd_this->wd_get_api( ). * lo_action = lo_api_controller->get_current_action( ).
* if lo_action is bound. * case lo_action->name. * when '...'.
* endcase. * endif. endmethod.

method WDDOBEFOREACTION . * data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller. * data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
* lo_api_controller = wd_this->wd_get_api( ). * lo_action = lo_api_controller->get_current_action( ).
* if lo_action is bound. * case lo_action->name. * when '...'.
* endcase. * endif. endmethod.

method WDDOBEFOREACTION . * data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller. * data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
* lo_api_controller = wd_this->wd_get_api( ). * lo_action = lo_api_controller->get_current_action( ).
* if lo_action is bound. * case lo_action->name. * when '...'.
* endcase. * endif. endmethod.

METHOD handledefault .
DATA: lv_action TYPE c, lv_username TYPE xubname, lv_uuid TYPE sysuuid-c, lv_valid TYPE boolean, lv_message TYPE natxt, lv_password TYPE char8, lv_subrc TYPE syst_subrc, lv_e_message_l1 TYPE natxt, lv_e_message_l2 TYPE natxt, lv_s_message_l1 TYPE natxt, lv_s_message_l2 TYPE natxt, lv_s_message_l3 TYPE natxt, lv_m_message_l1 TYPE natxt, lv_m_message_l2 TYPE natxt, lv_m_message_l3 TYPE natxt, lv_m_message_l4 TYPE natxt, lv_m_message_l5 TYPE natxt, lv_email_address TYPE ad_smtpadr, lv_fullname TYPE ad_namtext, lv_subject TYPE so_obj_des.
DATA lo_componentcontroller TYPE REF TO ig_componentcontroller . lo_componentcontroller = wd_this->get_componentcontroller_ctr( ).
DATA lo_nd_success_messages TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_success_messages TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_success_messages TYPE wd_this->element_success_messages.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <SUCCESS_MESSAGES> via lead selection lo_nd_success_messages = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_success_messages ). * get element via lead selection lo_el_success_messages = lo_nd_success_messages->get_element( ).
DATA lo_nd_email_message TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_email_message TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_email_message TYPE wd_this->element_email_message. DATA lv_sender TYPE wd_this->element_email_message-sender.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <EMAIL_MESSAGE> via lead selection lo_nd_email_message = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_email_message ). * get element via lead selection lo_el_email_message = lo_nd_email_message->get_element( ).
DATA lo_nd_error_messages TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_error_messages TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_error_messages TYPE wd_this->element_error_messages.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <ERROR_MESSAGES> via lead selection lo_nd_error_messages = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_error_messages ). * get element via lead selection lo_el_error_messages = lo_nd_error_messages->get_element( ).
lv_action = action. lv_username = username. lv_uuid = uuid.
"Check whether it's Reset Request from email IF lv_action IS NOT INITIAL AND lv_username IS NOT INITIAL AND lv_uuid IS NOT INITIAL.
"Verify authenticity of Reset Request lo_componentcontroller->verify_auth_from_table( EXPORTING im_authdate = sy-datum im_uname = lv_username im_uuid = lv_uuid IMPORTING ex_valid = lv_valid ).
IF lv_valid = abap_true. "Password Reset Request verified SET LOCALE LANGUAGE 'E'. TRANSLATE lv_action TO UPPER CASE. SET LOCALE LANGUAGE ' '. IF lv_action = 'Y'. * reset password lo_componentcontroller->reset_password( EXPORTING im_username = lv_username IMPORTING ex_message = lv_message ex_password = lv_password ex_subrc = lv_subrc ).
IF lv_subrc NE 0. * Error messages lv_e_message_l1 = lv_message. MESSAGE e016(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_e_message_l2. * Please contact your system administrator.
ls_error_messages-line01 = lv_e_message_l1. ls_error_messages-line02 = lv_e_message_l2.
* set all declared attributes lo_el_error_messages->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_error_messages ).
wd_this->fire_to_error_plg( ).
ELSE. * Success Messages MESSAGE s017(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_s_message_l1. * Your password has been reset. MESSAGE s018(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_s_message_l2. * A temporary password has been sent to your email address. MESSAGE s019(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_s_message_l3. * Please check your email for further instructions.
ls_success_messages-line01 = lv_s_message_l1. ls_success_messages-line02 = lv_s_message_l2. ls_success_messages-line03 = lv_s_message_l3.
* set all declared attributes lo_el_success_messages->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_success_messages ).
* Email Message
lo_componentcontroller->get_email_parameters( EXPORTING im_username = lv_username IMPORTING ex_email_address = lv_email_address ex_fullname = lv_fullname ).
MESSAGE s007(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_m_message_l1. * Dear CONCATENATE lv_m_message_l1 lv_fullname INTO lv_m_message_l1 SEPARATED BY space. CONCATENATE lv_m_message_l1 ',' INTO lv_m_message_l1.
MESSAGE s020(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_m_message_l2. * As per your request, please find below your temporary password.
lv_m_message_l3 = lv_password.
MESSAGE s021(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_m_message_l4. * After logging in, you will be asked to choose a new password. MESSAGE s011(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_m_message_l5. * This is a computer-generated email. Please do not reply to this email.
* get single attribute lo_el_email_message->get_attribute( EXPORTING name = `SENDER` IMPORTING value = lv_sender ).
MESSAGE s014(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_subject. * Password Reset Confirmation
ls_email_message-sender = lv_sender. ls_email_message-recipient = lv_email_address. ls_email_message-subject = lv_subject. ls_email_message-line01 = lv_m_message_l1. ls_email_message-line02 = lv_m_message_l2. ls_email_message-line03 = lv_m_message_l3. ls_email_message-line04 = lv_m_message_l4. ls_email_message-line05 = lv_m_message_l5.
* set all declared attributes lo_el_email_message->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_email_message ).
* go to confirmation page and send email wd_this->fire_to_confirmation_plg( ).
ENDIF.
ENDIF.
ELSE. "Reset Request verify wrong * Error messages
MESSAGE e022(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_e_message_l1. * Your request has expired. Please start again.
ls_error_messages-line01 = lv_e_message_l1. ls_error_messages-line02 = space.
* set all declared attributes lo_el_error_messages->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_error_messages ).
wd_this->fire_to_error_plg( ). ENDIF.
ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Get name and email address of user
Reset the user's password to auto generated
Send temporary password to user
Verify the authenticity of the user
